title: 02/26/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/26/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the weekly Meat Friday show opened up about Russell Wilson

and his list of teams that he would lift his no-trade clause for. While Wilson’s party did not say

they were demanding a trade, DP certainly thinks the list insists such. NFL Network insider Ian

Rapoport joined the show to talk about Wilson’s future, Drew Brees’ retirement, and more in

the world of football. Barbeque expert Daniel Vaughn joined the show in the second hour to

respond to Nick Wright’s comments from the day before how Texas does not have good

barbeque. Lastly, former NFL executive Andrew Brandt joined Dan with plans to pay up on a

shower of shame bet surrounding Carson Wentz. However, some miscommunication in

wording kept Brandt dry for now, at least until Deshaun Watson finds a new home.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
